text: Labo okwabo kuyoba izivande zaphakade okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula lapho (ezivandeni) bayohlotshiswa ngemigexo eyakhiwe ngegolide futhi bayogqoka izingubo zikasilika eziluhlaza ezicolekile ezilula neziwugqinsi, bayobala lapho ezihlalweni eziphakeme (lowo) ngomvuzo wekhethelo nendawo enhle yokuphumula
